sentences.simplifiedText: 他站在山顶，俯瞰下面宽广的土地，感到异常的宁静。
sentences.traditionalText: 他站在山頂，俯瞰下面寬廣的土地，感到異常的寧靜。
sentences.pinyin: Tā zhàn zài shāndǐng, fǔkàn xiàmiàn kuānguǎng de tǔdì, gǎndào yìcháng de níngjìng.
sentences.translation: He stood on top of the mountain, overlooking the wide land below, and felt extraordinarily peaceful.

sentences.simplifiedText: 据我了解，这个大学的研究领域非常宽广，涵盖了艺术、科学、文学和技术等众多领域。
sentences.traditionalText: 據我了解，這個大學的研究領域非常寬廣，涵蓋了藝術、科學、文學和技術等眾多領域。
sentences.pinyin: Jù wǒ liǎojiě, zhège dàxué de yánjiū lǐngyù fēicháng kuānguǎng, hángài le yìshù, kēxué, wénxué hé jìshù děng zhòngduō lǐngyù.
sentences.translation: From what I understand, the research areas of this university are very extensive, covering many areas such as art, science, literature, and technology.
